flavorText: When the moon rises and the bloodlust takes hold, nothing matters but the kill.
name: Curse of the Nightly Hunt

rulings.text: The enchanted player still chooses which player or planeswalker each creature they control attacks.

If, during the enchanted player’s declare attackers step, a creature they control is tapped, is affected by a spell or ability that says it can’t attack, or hasn’t been under that player’s control continuously since the turn began (and doesn’t have haste), then it doesn’t attack. If there’s a cost associated with having the creature attack, the player isn’t forced to pay that cost, so it doesn’t have to attack in that case either.

text:
Enchant player
Creatures enchanted player controls attack each combat if able.
